nodes.text: Xephi Sep was a renowned artist. Both the Emperor and Kuari suites of the luxury liner Kuari Princess featured an original kinesculpture by Sep during the Galactic Civil War.

Xephi Sep was mentioned in West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game book Riders of the Maelstrom, written by Ray Winninger and published in July 1989. A nod to Sep appears in the canon reference book Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy, written by Pablo Hidalgo and released on October 25, 2016, in the form of the Xephi Sep Award.
